channel.title: How many guards and scientists can we find in the game? - Here is the answer.
channel.description:
Greetings everyone!
While waiting patiently for the next great update, I decided to make an attempt at determining the number of Black Mesa employees we can find throughout the game. Years ago I did it with Half-Life. There, excluding the Hazard Course and the Xen chapters, we can find:
[b] 34 security guards alive, 22 dead.[/b]
[b] 104 scientists alive and 57 dead.[/b]
[b] 35 zombies[/b] and [b]3 awesome forklifter guys, called "Gus".[/b]
This puts the total number at [b]255[/b].
With Black Mesa, this quest took me... slightly longer. First thing first, I made a couple of rules for the job, like:
- Anomalous Materials and Unforseen Consequences chapters are considered completly separate.
- Scripted events are ignored. If an npc is alive at the moment we find him, than he is marked as alive.
- Zombies.... alive, dead, half dead or very dead... they are all the same to me.
- Burnt bodies are counted: usually it's easy to determine wether they were friends or foes.
- If only a part of the body remains, I look for a vital part like torso, spine or skull. A lonely severed leg doesn't have to mean it's owner is dead (rip Eli Vance)
- Sometimes only some suspecious blood mark remains on the floor or on the walls. Those are counted as well.
One question remains. What version of the game I used?
* The up to date Steam version of Black Mesa, extended with the [b]OAR: Uncut[/b] and [b]WGH - Vent Mods[/b].
So , here is the brakedown of all the chapters. Or you can just skip it it to avoid nightmares with all these numbers.

[b]LAMBDA CORE[/b]

bm_c3a2c: Security guards: 1 alive Scientists: 1 alive, 7 dead

bm_c3a2f:-
bm_c3a2g: Security guards: 2 alive Scientists: 2 alive, 3 dead
bm_c3a2h: Security guards: 1 alive, 1 dead Scientists: 5 alive, 2 dead
[/spoiler]
Summa summarum, in Black Mesa, I've found
* [b]51 security guards alive, 81 dead and 33 zombified.[/b] * [b]146 scientists alive, 136 dead and 106 zombified.[/b] * [b]34 suspecious blood or body remains.[/b] * [b]6 suspecious burned husks.[/b] * [b]22 dead engineers (in OAR UNCUT)[/b] * [b]and 8 dead office clerks (in OAR UNCUT)[/b] This puts the total number at [b]623[/b]. - 39% of the total 1600 employees the BMRF claims to has in an advertisement.
Phew. This is it for now...
... or did I miss anything? Well, if we want to go even crazier... there is a total [b]147 barnacles[/b] spread around the facility. When killed, every single of them spits out some human remains, including a skull usually. Guess our collegues really lost their heads in the chaos.
